produce_group-001|description: 『Hajime』── It is a stage that only the top performers of Hatsuboshi Idol Academy can stand on. Polishing themselves, now, they begin to shine──
produce_group-002|description:
『NEXT IDOL AUDITION』 ──a.k.a.『N.I.A』
The race to determine the top idol of the next generation has begun! Gather your fans and join us on the stage of glory──
